arena

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • arena.Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a Bullet object. Bullets are single points for collision purposes, but are drawn with a tail to make them more visible. The collision point is on the leading side of the Bullet. None of this information is accessible outside of the arena package.
